subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy started slowly at Royal Liverpool in the third round but after Rickie Fowler drew even, rallied to lead by six strokes at 16-under 200.
snippet: Rory McIlroy started slowly at Royal Liverpool in the third round but after Rickie Fowler drew even, rallied to lead by six strokes at 16-under 200.
